title: Stanford AI Village [JUST 2023] Episodic memory of experience

definitions.Reflection: Klaus Mueller is highly dedicated to research
definitions.Plan: For Wednesday February 13: wake up and complete the morning routine at 7:00 am, read and take notes for research paper at 8:00 am, have lunch at 12:00 pm, write down ideas or brainstorm potential solutions at 1:00 pm, [...]
definitions.Observation: Klaus Mueller is reading about gentrification

formulas: Klaus Mueller spends many hours reading
summary: The slide presents a reflection tree for Klaus Mueller, showing his dedication to research through various observations and plans. The tree includes his daily routine, his reading habits, and his interactions with a librarian, all of which contribute to his research on urban design and gentrification.
